title: Boutique Morocco Desert Villas Overlooking Dakhla Lagoon with All-Inclusive Dining & Return Airport Transfers
description:
Fall in love with the golden sandscapes, mountainous dunes, and endless stretch of the Atlantic Ocean at this bespoke property set among the Moroccan desert. With its calming nomadic architecture, this unique and luxurious retreat offers the perfect opportunity to disconnect amidst stunning landscapes. 

Spend your days basking by the oasis pool surrounded by plush loungers and cabanas overlooking the lagoon, or indulge in a lavish treatment at the spa. Savour a fusion of delectable Moroccan and Mexican cuisine at Levante restaurant, rejuvenate with a session of yoga at dawn, or explore the nearby Dakhla Lagoon, a paradise for kitesurfing enthusiasts. 

The resort is every ocean lover's heaven, with an onsite Kite House teeming with proriders, riding the waves and surfing the winds all year round. For a real taste of the local culture and lifestyle, the vibrant city of Dakhla, with its bustling markets and historic architecture, is just a short drive away.
offer_address: Caravan by Habitas, PK25, Dakhla, Morocco, Africa
